name: Rain of Frogs
components: V, S, M/DF (a square of red cloth)
text: This spell functions as summon swarm, except you summon a swarm of poisonous frogs. This swarm has the statistics of a centipede swarm, except it has the animal type and its poison deals Constitution damage instead of Dexterity damage.
text_zh:
这个法术类似于飞虫走兽 (summon swarm)，不过你可以召唤一个毒蟾蜍集群。

这个集群的属性资料等于蜈蚣集群 (centipede swarm)，不过它的种族为动物，并且毒素不造成敏捷伤害，而造成体质伤害。
